00032 class CorrespondenceSet : public EquivalencePartition<GPixel> {
00033 public:

00036 
00040 inline int CorrespondenceSet::add_correspondence(const Correspondence &corr) {
00041   return(equate(corr.i, corr.j));
00042 }
